title: Melanie Lynskey | Trump Held in Contempt, Endorses Nonexistent Person Named "J.D. Mandel": A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at a judge ruling that Trump will remain in contempt of court after failing to comply with a subpoena in a fraud investigation as more bombshell text messages emerged implicating more GOP members of Congress in the attempted coup on January 6.

Then, Melanie Lynskey talks about playing a former cannibal on Yellowjackets; her husband, Jason Ritter, attempting to scare her and their daughter; and trying to pull off wigs with Jessica Biel in the series Candy. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
